Detailed Description

Offline word and word properties database.

Initialize a new instance using the provided path.

Parameters:
pathThe path to the database bundle.

- (WNWordObject *) wordWithWord: (NSString *)  word

Create a word and all of the properties present in the database for the given word.

Parameters:
wordStringThe word string to lookup.
Returns:
Returns an WNWordObject instance containing all the information for the wordString in the database.
